attributes.additional_details:
I believe Local Authorities have lost respect from the public.
Authorities wasting money and searching plaudits and merits
attributes.background: Manage Local Authorities by setting up an inspection board to make Local Authorities more transparent and accountable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition suggests setting up an inspection board for local authorities, but it's not clear what the remit or focus of this body would be.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
